heroSubtitle: Direct connection platform for applicants and universities. Transparent admissions and scholarships in one place.
ctaText: See how Edmission helps applicants find universities and scholarships.
pillar1Desc: Applicants and universities without middlemen or hidden commissions
pillar2Desc: Match by programs, scholarships and requirements
pillar3Desc: Manage scholarships and quotas in one place
pillar4Desc: Unified pipeline for applications and offers
pillar5Desc: Recommendations and tips based on your data
step1Body: We discuss your admission goals and current applications.
step2Body: Analysis of programs and scholarships. Building admission strategy.
step3Body: Submitting applications and tracking statuses through Edmission.
step4Body: Tracking responses and chats with admissions offices.
step5Body: Clear status for each application, notifications about offers.
contactTitle: Write to us: we will discuss your needs
contactThanks: Thank you! We will get back to you soon.
